title: Dont you think the matching system is out of date?
body:
I think the matching system is really retarded that lv >20 can match with those below 20.
I mean, most of the players will get as many runes as they can when they are 20.
Which turns out to become that once a lv.>20 fd match with a new player,
that player can probably get all wins to lv. 20.

If you want new players to learn, 
that should just be learning from matching with similar level players but not carried by a experienced player with runes.
That would just made the new player winning without learning from failure.

I think the match system should restrict the level difference within a team to only 10 levels.
Or even that lv. 1-20 is in a group and lv. 21-30 is in another group.

So if a new player want to play with their friends, their friends has to open a new account,
instead of using the account with full runes and making fun on other new players' sadness.

replies.body: Just use the time to learn and to improve more and just give yourself a higher difficulty game
Sounds like you just need to level up don't worry about level mismatches it is not even 5% of the game and or take some level 30s in game with you
